Title: Creates a subpart of the housing part to handle cases involving condominiums and cooperative buildings
Summary: Creates a special subpart of the housing part within the NYC civil court to handle cases involving condominiums and cooperative buildings.
LawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
LawCode: Amd ยง110, NYC Civ Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, in relation to establishing a subpart to hear housing matters related to cooperative and condominium buildings
